title: Larkin Poe, A Sister Act With Staying-Power
teaser: Rebecca and Megan Lovell have sung together since they were children. Now they are all grown up, and form the mellifluous band, Larkin Poe. The sisters speak with NPR's Ari Shapiro about their music.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
